evolutionmod:Mossbeast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! evolutionmod:Growth. NL evolutionmod:PlantGene evolutionmod:Form: evolutionmod:Adapt with your oldest evolutionmod:PlantGene gene.

evolutionmod:Phoenix.NAME: Phoenix
evolutionmod:Phoenix.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL evolutionmod:Adapt with your oldest evolutionmod:LavafolkGene gene. NL evolutionmod:HarpyGene evolutionmod:Form: NL Channel a evolutionmod:LavafolkGene gene first.
evolutionmod:Phoenix.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL evolutionmod:Adapt with ALL your evolutionmod:LavafolkGene genes. NL evolutionmod:HarpyGene evolutionmod:Form: NL Channel a evolutionmod:LavafolkGene gene first.

evolutionmod:Symbiotes.NAME: Symbiotes
evolutionmod:Symbiotes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever evolutionmod:Growth produces energy add a Drone to your hand. NL evolutionmod:PlantGene evolutionmod:Form: gain 2 evolutionmod:Growth.
Gain !M! Brambles and Block the first time you play a Drone each turn. NL evolutionmod:InsectGene evolutionmod:Form: evolutionmod:PlantGene evolutionmod:Form: Refund 1.
evolutionmod:Symbiotes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever evolutionmod:Growth produces energy add a Drone to your hand. NL Gain 1 evolutionmod:Growth. NL evolutionmod:PlantGene evolutionmod:Form: gain 2 evolutionmod:Growth.

evolutionmod:Salamander.NAME: Salamander
evolutionmod:Salamander.DESCRIPTION: Your evolutionmod:LizardGene gene also deal 2 damage. NL Your evolutionmod:LavafolkGene gene deal 1 more damage.
Your evolutionmod:LizardGene also deal 2 damage. NL Your evolutionmod:LavafolkGene deal 1 more damage. NL evolutionmod:LizardGene evolutionmod:Form: Channel a evolutionmod:LavafolkGene.
evolutionmod:Salamander.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your evolutionmod:LizardGene also deal 2 damage. NL Your evolutionmod:LavafolkGene deal 1 more damage. NL Channel a evolutionmod:LizardGene and a evolutionmod:LavafolkGene.

evolutionmod:Battleborn.NAME: Battleborn
evolutionmod:Battleborn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL evolutionmod:CentaurGene evolutionmod:Form: gain 1 Strength.
evolutionmod:Battleborn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Channel a evolutionmod:CentaurGene gene.

evolutionmod:CurrentsDancer.NAME: Currents Dancer
evolutionmod:CurrentsDancer.DESCRIPTION: The first time you draw a card after the beginning of your turn gain !M! Block. NL evolutionmod:MerfolkGene evolutionmod:Form: draw a card.
Gain !M! Dexterity. NL evolutionmod:HarpyGene evolutionmod:Form: gain 1 Dexterity.

evolutionmod:DarkDesires.NAME: Dark Desires
evolutionmod:DarkDesires.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy deal !M! damage to it. evolutionmod:SuccubusGene evolutionmod:Form: Channel a evolutionmod:ShadowGene.
Whenever evolutionmod:Shadows trigger, apply !M! evolutionmod:Lust to ALL enemies. NL Channel a evolutionmod:ShadowGene gene.

evolutionmod:ShiftingStrike.NAME: Shifting Strike
evolutionmod:ShiftingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your first gene. NL evolutionmod:Shift your first gene.
Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your first gene with the same target if possible. NL evolutionmod:Shift your first gene.
evolutionmod:ShiftingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your first !M! genes and evolutionmod:Shift them.
Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your first !M! genes with the same target if possible and evolutionmod:Shift them.

evolutionmod:ShiftingGuard.NAME: Shifting Guard
evolutionmod:ShiftingGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger your first gene. NL evolutionmod:Shift your first gene.
evolutionmod:ShiftingGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger your first !M! genes and evolutionmod:Shift them.

evolutionmod:ShiftingPower.NAME: Shifting Power
evolutionmod:ShiftingPower.DESCRIPTION: Trigger your first gene. NL evolutionmod:Shift a number of genes equal to your current energy.
evolutionmod:ShiftingPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger your first !M! genes. NL evolutionmod:Shift a number of genes equal to your current energy.

evolutionmod:ChimeraPower.NAME: Chimera Power
evolutionmod:ChimeraPower.DESCRIPTION: evolutionmod:Adapt this with your !M! rightmost genes not already adapted.

evolutionmod:ChimeraStrike.NAME: Chimera Strike
evolutionmod:ChimeraStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL evolutionmod:Adapt with your rightmost gene up to a maximum of !M!.

evolutionmod:ChimeraDefense.NAME: Chimera Defense
evolutionmod:ChimeraDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL evolutionmod:Adapt with your rightmost gene up to a maximum of !M!.

evolutionmod:Mutate.NAME: Mutate
evolutionmod:Mutate.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! genes you don't already have and Channel it.
evolutionmod:Mutate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! genes you don't already have. Channel it and trigger its effect.

evolutionmod:Adaptation.NAME: Adaptation
evolutionmod:Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: evolutionmod:Adapt with your X oldest genes. NL Startup: add a random adaptation.
evolutionmod:Adaptation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: evolutionmod:Adapt with X channeled genes of your choice. NL Startup: add two random adaptations.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: evolutionmod:Adapt with your X oldest genes. NL Startup: add

evolutionmod:CrystalShard.NAME: Crystal Shard
evolutionmod:CrystalShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Randomized evolutionmod:Form: NL add !M! damage. NL Randomized evolutionmod:Form: NL draw a card. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: evolutionmod:Form: NL draw a card. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:CrystalShield.NAME: Crystal Shield
evolutionmod:CrystalShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Randomized evolutionmod:Form: NL add !M! Block. NL Randomized evolutionmod:Form: NL Refund 1. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:CrystalDust.NAME: Crystal Dust
evolutionmod:CrystalDust.DESCRIPTION: evolutionmod:Form: draw a card. NL Exhaust. NL Startup: shuffle a copy of this card in your draw pile.
Randomized evolutionmod:Form: draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust. NL Startup: shuffle a copy of this card in your draw pile.
evolutionmod:CrystalDust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: evolutionmod:Form: draw a card. NL Exhaust. NL Startup: shuffle !M! copies of this card in your draw pile.

evolutionmod:Form: draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust. NL Startup: shuffle !M! copies of this card in your draw pile.

evolutionmod:Flash.NAME: Gene Flash
evolutionmod:Flash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke the Imprinted gene. NL Exhausts if no gene was Evoked.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: gene. NL Exhausts if no gene was Evoked.

evolutionmod:Echo.NAME: Gene Echo
evolutionmod:Echo.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the Imprinted gene effect. NL Re-Imprint this card with your oldest Gene.
evolutionmod:Echo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the Imprinted gene effect twice. NL Re-Imprint this card with your oldest Gene.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: gene effect. NL Re-Imprinted this card with your oldest Gene.
gene effect twice. NL Re-Imprint this card with your oldest Gene.

evolutionmod:Treasure.NAME: Treasure
evolutionmod:Treasure.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Crystal Stone, Shard or Dust to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
evolutionmod:Treasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an upgraded Crystal Stone, Shard or Dust to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:CrystalShaping.NAME: Crystal Shaping
evolutionmod:CrystalShaping.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Crystal Shield, Shard or Dust matching your oldest genes to your hand.
Add a Crystal Stone, Shard or Dust from your exhaust pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
evolutionmod:CrystalShaping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a !M! Crystal Stone, Shard or Dust from your exhaust pile into your hand.

evolutionmod:GeneBlast.NAME: Gene Blast
evolutionmod:GeneBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. [#F04040]Imprinted[] evolutionmod:Form: add !M! damage and [#F04040]Imprint[] your oldest gene.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: evolutionmod:Form: add !M! damage and [#F04040]Imprint[] your oldest gene.

evolutionmod:Mastery.NAME: Gene Mastery
evolutionmod:Mastery.DESCRIPTION: When you channel an [#F04040]Imprinted[] gene, trigger its effect. NL [#F04040]Imprinted[] evolutionmod:Form: gain an Orb slot
evolutionmod:Mastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you channel an [#F04040]Imprinted[] gene, trigger its effect. NL Gain an Orb slot and Channel the [#F04040]Imprinted[] gene.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain an Orb slot and Channel a

evolutionmod:Absorption.NAME: Absorption
evolutionmod:Absorption.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all genes of your oldest type. NL At the start of your turn trigger their effect.
evolutionmod:Absorption.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke all genes of your !M! oldest types. NL At the start of your turn trigger their effect.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need to channel a Gene first.

evolutionmod:Grow.NAME: Grow
evolutionmod:Grow.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. Startup: shuffle a copy of this card in your draw pile.
evolutionmod:Grow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. Startup: shuffle !M! copies of this card in your draw pile.

evolutionmod:Shrink.NAME: Shrink
evolutionmod:Shrink.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Orb slot. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.
evolutionmod:Shrink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Lose 1 Orb slot. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.

evolutionmod:Ritual.NAME: Ritual
evolutionmod:Ritual.DESCRIPTION: Permanently evolutionmod:Adapt this with your oldest gene not already adapted. NL Exhaust.
evolutionmod:Ritual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Permanently evolutionmod:Adapt this with your oldest gene not already adapted. NL Ethereal.

evolutionmod:GodlyPowers.NAME: Godly Powers
evolutionmod:GodlyPowers.DESCRIPTION: Each turn the first !M! evolutionmod:Form that Channel a gene also apply their conditional effect.
All evolutionmod:Form effects activate. NL The first !M! genes you channel each turn trigger immediately.
At the start of your turn trigger all your genes.

evolutionmod:HumanForm.NAME: Human Form
evolutionmod:HumanForm.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all your genes. When you Channel a gene, Evoke it once.
Trigger all your genes !M! times and Evoke them. NL When you Channel a gene, trigger it !M! times and Evoke it.

evolutionmod:Gene.NAME: Gene
evolutionmod:Gene.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Does not scale with Strength. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.
evolutionmod:Gene.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel this gene and trigger its effect.

evolutionmod:Drone.NAME: Drone
evolutionmod:Drone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is in you hand at the end of your turn gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.
Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Does not scale with Strength or Dexterity. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.
Deal !D! damage. NL Does not scale with Strength. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

evolutionmod:DroneSoldier.NAME: Drone Soldier
evolutionmod:DroneSoldier.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is in you hand at the end of your turn gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

evolutionmod:Feather.NAME: Feather
evolutionmod:Feather.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and discard a card. NL evolutionmod:HarpyGene evolutionmod:Form: return a Feather Storm from your discard pile to your hand.
evolutionmod:Feather.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and discard !M! cards. NL evolutionmod:HarpyGene evolutionmod:Form: return a Feather Storm from your discard pile to your hand.
Draw a card. You may discard a card. NL evolutionmod:HarpyGene evolutionmod:Form: return a Feather Storm from your discard pile to your hand.

mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power and [#FF5252]Poise multiplied by !M!.
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power and [#FF5252]Poise multiplied by !M!.
